CONTACT DATA AND AUDIENCES
Web Analytics Dimension Package

The Web Analytics Dimension Package in Audience Builder provides standard dimensions and requires no custom implementation.

Use query activities to join SubscriberID to a system data view to populate the subscriber key field in the data extension templates.

With the Web Analytics Dimension Package, you can identify these subscribers:

Abandoned a specific product by name or hierarchy
Visited a specific product, product hierarchy, or page category
Browsed a specific number of pages or products in a given time frame
Prerequisites

Existing Audience Builder users must contact their relationship manager to upgrade to these new dimension packages. Other requirements include Audience Builder Drill Tree configuration and access to web analytics feeds from your websites. Review Web Analytics Package Technical Specifications for technical information. Your web analytic data feeds must contain identifiable subscribers using either a Subscriber Key or Marketing Cloud Engagement SubscriberID.

Web Analytics > Cart Abandonment

Select subscribers based on the Abandon by Product Hierarchy and Abandon Product Level 1 dimension packages. You get one product level into which to populate your data. You can also select by using custom selection:

Products Browsed by SKU

You can use an unlimited number of SKU values. The product catalog file imported into the data extension populates these values.

Web Analytics Dimension Package Technical Specifications
The Web Analytics Dimension Package Set includes standard dimension packages derived from a standardized data extension–based data model. It brings web analytics data into Audience Builder without needing custom implementation.
